source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an architectural scenery shot of a sterile, minimalist interior. The space is defined by white tiled floors and walls, with the lower portion of the walls finished in a contrasting dark, textured material. A prominent curved wall features a series of tall, capsule-shaped windows that glow with a bright, diffuse white light, illuminating the empty room. There is no main subject, as the focus is entirely on the stark, clean geometry and liminal atmosphere of the environment itself. The composition emphasizes the architectural lines and play of light rather than a specific focal point.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
delete"illuminating the empty room.", EXPLAIN :seen from the even light in this room, the room might not only illuminated by light from the window, but also has other unseen light source

delete"A prominent curved wall "the curving is caused by distortion of the camera

delete"play of light "
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback:
Please remove the phrase "illuminating the empty room." The even lighting suggests that the room may not be solely illuminated by the windows, but also by other unseen light sources.

Please remove "A prominent curved wall." The curvature appears to be a result of camera distortion.

Please remove "play of light."
